Services

At Anya Consultancy, our aim is to always offer you a high quality service to ensure that your business runs smoothly.

Business
Intelligence.

We’re proud to be a Microsoft Gold Partner and certified in all aspects of Microsoft technology. Our technology experts can help you select the right software package for your business and get you one step closer to maximizing your return on investment.

Application
Development

We build applications that are easy to use, visually appealing, and bring at least one new idea to their users. Our experts will help you put together something that is innovative and cutting-edge.
